Create item-level missingness shadow

Source: R/margot-shadows.R
create_item_missingness_shadow.Rd

Create item-level missingness shadow

Usage

create_item_missingness_shadow(
  variables,
  missing_rate,
  missing_mechanism = c("MCAR", "MAR", "MNAR"),
  dependent_vars = NULL,
  name = "item_missingness"
)

Arguments

variables

Character vector of variables to apply missingness to

missing_rate

Numeric. Overall missing rate (0-1)

missing_mechanism

Character. One of "MCAR", "MAR", "MNAR"

dependent_vars

Character vector. Variables that influence missingness (for MAR/MNAR)

name

Optional name for the shadow

Value

Item missingness shadow object
